title: Hardware Specialist at Student Technology Collaborative
content: As a hardware specialist of Yale STC, a branch of Yale's IT department, I regularly repair the personal computers of students. Additionally, as a queue coordinator, I managed all of the tickets for students enrolled in either the Yale School of Management or the Yale Forestry School.

title: Co-President of Ivy Space Coalition
content: The Ivy Space Coalition (ISC) is an undergraduate group with representatives across the 8 Ivy League institutions that focuses on building a community of aspiring entrepreneurs and aerospace engineers. Every year the ISC hosts the ISC Conference that invites industry leaders from across the world to give presentation and interact directly with students.

title: Associate Software Engineer at DMA Labs
content: Under the direct guidance of the CTO and CSO, I created graphql APIs for tracking historical financial data. These improvements decreased reliance on costly external API calls by ~30%. Furthermore, created a full-text search database and its corresponding ETL pipeline to summarize transactions both quantitatively and qualitatively. I also created detailed reports on IRR, APR, and other metrics with email/text notifications triggered by fluctuations.
